GetProductExtendSetting.Statement: SELECT w2_ProductExtendSetting.* FROM w2_ProductExtendSetting WHERE w2_ProductExtendSetting.shop_id = @shop_id

UpdateProductExtendSetting.Statement: UPDATE w2_ProductExtendSetting SET w2_ProductExtendSetting.extend_name = @extend_name, w2_ProductExtendSetting.extend_discription = @extend_discription, w2_ProductExtendSetting.date_changed = getdate(), w2_ProductExtendSetting.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_ProductExtendSetting.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ProductExtendSetting.extend_no = @extend_no

DeleteProductExtendSetting.Statement: DELETE FROM w2_ProductExtendSetting WHERE w2_ProductExtendSetting.shop_id = @shop_id AND w2_ProductExtendSetting.extend_no = @extend_no

ClearProductExtend.Statement: UPDATE w2_ProductExtend SET @@ field @@ = '' WHERE w2_ProductExtend.shop_id = @shop_id
